name: Dheeraj Kumar
tagline: Consultant at JMR Infotech | Full-Stack Developer | Banking & Financial Software Specialist
bio: Consultant at JMR Infotech specializing in full-stack development. Former Staff Consultant at Oracle Financial Services Software with 2.5+ years of experience building web applications for Banking and Financial clients. Expert in HTML, CSS, JavaScript, Java, Spring Boot, and SQL. Proficient in Oracle OBDX and FLEXCUBE Universal Banking solutions.
